info.title: TDEI Management API
info.description: Management API, describes admin & user activities in the TDEI system.

post.summary: Authenticates the user to the TDEI system
post.description: Authenticates the user to the TDEI system.  Returns access token.

200.description: Successful response - Returns the access token object.
Successful response - Returns the access token object.
Successful response - Returns the list of roles.

get.summary: Gets the user associated organizations with roles.
get.description: Gets the user associated organizations with roles.

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: User id for which oraganizations to be fetched

200.description: Successful response - Returns the user oraganizations with roles.

403.description: User not authenticated/authorized to perform this action.

post.summary: Registers the user to the TDEI system
post.description: Registers the user to the TDEI system.  Returns new User object.

200.description: Successful response - Returns the newly created object.

403.description: User not authenticated/authorized to perform this action.

get.summary: Gets the GTFS Pathways Station in the TDEI system
get.description: Gets the GTFS Pathways Station in the TDEI system .

parameters.name: bbox
parameters.description: A bounding box which specifies the area to be searched. A bounding box is specified by a string providing the lat/lon coordinates of the corners of the bounding box. Coordinate should be specified as west, south, east, north.

200.description: Returns the list of GTFS Pathways stations.

403.description: User not authenticated/authorized to perform this action.

post.summary: Creates a GTFS Pathways station in the TDEI system
post.description: Creates a GTFS Pathways station in the TDEI system. Returns the id for the newly created pathways station.

200.description: Successful response - Returns the id for the newly created pathways station.

403.description: User not authenticated/authorized to perform this action.

put.summary: Updates a GTFS Pathways station in the TDEI system
put.description: Updates a GTFS Pathways station in the TDEI system.

200.description: GTFS Pathways station update successful.

403.description: User not authenticated/authorized to perform this action.

parameters.name: stationId
parameters.description: Station Id of the station to be Activated/Deactivated.

200.description: Successful.

403.description: User not authenticated/authorized to perform this action.

get.summary: Gets the GTFS Flex services in the TDEI system
get.description: Gets the GTFS Flex services in the TDEI system .

parameters.name: bbox
parameters.description: A bounding box which specifies the area to be searched. A bounding box is specified by a string providing the lat/lon coordinates of the corners of the bounding box. Coordinate should be specified as west, south, east, north.

200.description: Returns the list of GTFS Flex service.

403.description: User not authenticated/authorized to perform this action.

post.summary: Creates a GTFS flex service in the TDEI system
post.description: Creates a GTFS flex service in the TDEI system.Returns the id for the newly created flex service.

200.description: Successful response - Returns the id for the newly created flex service.

403.description: User not authenticated/authorized to perform this action.

put.summary: Updates a GTFS flex service in the TDEI system
put.description: Updates a GTFS flex service in the TDEI system.

200.description: GTFS Flex service update successful.

403.description: User not authenticated/authorized to perform this action.

parameters.name: serviceId
parameters.description: Service Id of the service to be Activated/Deactivated.

200.description: Successful.

403.description: User not authenticated/authorized to perform this action.

post.summary: Creates a point of contact in the TDEI system. This API will be deprecated, please use /permission API to assign POC
post.description: Creates a point of contact in the TDEI system. Returns the boolean flag true. This API will be deprecated, please use /permission API to assign POC

200.description: Successful response - Returns the boolean flag true.

403.description: User not authenticated/authorized to perform this action.

post.summary: Associates a user with the organization and permissions in the TDEI system
post.description: Associates a user with the organization and permissions in the TDEI system. Returns the boolean flag true.

200.description: Successful response - Returns the boolean flag true.

403.description: User not authenticated/authorized to perform this action.

200.description: Successful response - Returns the boolean flag true.

403.description: User not authenticated/authorized to perform this action.

get.summary: Gets the organizations in the TDEI system
get.description: Gets the organizations in the TDEI system .

parameters.name: bbox
parameters.description: A bounding box which specifies the area to be searched. A bounding box is specified by a string providing the lat/lon coordinates of the corners of the bounding box. Coordinate should be specified as west, south, east, north.

200.description: Returns the list of organizations.

403.description: User not authenticated/authorized to perform this action.

post.summary: Creates an organization in the TDEI system
post.description: Creates an organization in the TDEI system.  Returns the id for the newly created organization.

200.description: Successful response - Returns the id for the newly created organization.

403.description: User not authenticated/authorized to perform this action.

put.summary: Updates an organization in the TDEI system
put.description: Updates an organization in the TDEI system.  Returns success if updated.

200.description: Organization update successful.

403.description: User not authenticated/authorized to perform this action.

get.summary: Gets the organization users in the TDEI system
get.description: Gets the organization users in the TDEI system .

parameters.name: orgId
parameters.description: Organization id for which users to be fetched

200.description: Returns the list of organization users.

403.description: User not authenticated/authorized to perform this action.

parameters.name: organizationId
parameters.description: Organization Id of the organization to be Activated/Deactivated.

200.description: Successful.

403.description: User not authenticated/authorized to perform this action.

roles.description: List of roles associated with oraganization.

id.description: User Id name of the user.

email.description: Email address of the user for communication.

phone.description: Phone of the user for communication.

email.description: Email address of the user for communication.

phone.description: Phone of the user for communication.

station_id.description: Station Id uniquely represented in the TDEI system. System generated.

name.description: Name of the location. The ame should match the agency's rider-facing name for the location as printed on a timetable, published online, or represented on signage.

name.description: Name of the location. The ame should match the agency's rider-facing name for the location as printed on a timetable, published online, or represented on signage.

service_id.description: Service Id uniquely represented in the TDEI system. System generated.
Service Id uniquely represented in the TDEI system. System generated.

org_id.description: Organization id to which point of contact to be associated.

poc_user_name.description: Point of contact username. Username represents user uniquely in the TDEI system. User should be already registered in the TDEI system using [POST] /user API.

PointOfContact.description: Describes a point of contact details.

org_id.description: Organization id to which user to be associated.

user_name.description: Username represents user uniquely in the TDEI system.  User should be already registered in the TDEI system using [POST] /user API.

roles.description: List of roles to be assigned to the user.

items.description: List of roles to be assigned to the user.
